name: ALUS
description:
A two-in-one game made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control".

In ALUS you control a crew member on a ship ferrying tourists around the galaxy. Unfortunately the ship is hit by a meteorite that wipes out the other crew, leaving only you and the mobility challenged Quub tourists to fend for yourself.

Oh, and the ship can't be piloted. Luckily moving around inside the ship will cause it to tilt from one side to the other, so maybe there's some time to save a few innocent paying customers...

The meteorite buddies of the first space rock are fast approaching. How many Quubs can you save in the swaying ship before your inevitable demise?

Made in a hurry with LÖVE and bump.lua for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Graphics from Kenney Game Assets.

Thanks to play testers and support personel.

Special thanks to borb for tips, ideas and rubber ducking.

(On Linux you can download the alus.love file and run it using the love executable. See the LÖVE site for more details.)
